bug.author: bee-san
bug.description:
If you're having problems installing Ciphey, read this.
Read this first https://docs.ciphey.online/en/latest/install.html
Are you using the latest version of Python? 3.8 and above? Ciphey does not support Python 2. Make sure to update :)
On Mac? Mac has some rather unique dylib searching functionality, which can lead to weird segfaults and errors.
Try using the xor-ciphers branch
On Windows? Windows users normally accidentally install 32-bit Python, as opposed to 64 bit. Please install 64 fit. Check this issue out for more info: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/issues/233#issuecomment-668695626>#233 (comment)</denchmark-link>
Still can't install? Please submit an issue using the bug report template.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.56. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback!
